ED_Title: Building a peaceful and better world through sport and  the Olympic ideal
ED_DecisionText: At its resumed 77th plenary meeting, on 8 July 2021, the General Assembly took note of the solemn appeal made by the President of the Assembly in connection with the observance of the Olympic Truce (A/75/956) .
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
